ud8.9:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
ud8.9:1.3: Atha kho ayasma dabbo mallaputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud8.9:1.4: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma dabbo mallaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud8.9:2.1: Atha kho ayasma dabbo mallaputto utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva vehasam abbhuggantva akase antalikkhe pallankena nisiditva tejodhatum samapajjitva vutthahitva parinibbayi.
ud8.9:3.1: Atha kho ayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa vehasam abbhuggantva akase antalikkhe pallankena nisiditva tejodhatum samapajjitva vutthahitva parinibbutassa sarirassa jhayamanassa dayhamanassa neva charika pannayittha na masi.
ud8.9:3.2: Seyyathapi nama sappissa va telassa va jhayamanassa dayhamanassa neva charika pannayati na masi;
ud8.9:3.3: evamevam ayasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa vehasam abbhuggantva akase antalikkhe pallankena nisiditva tejodhatum samapajjitva vutthahitva parinibbutassa sarirassa jhayamanassa dayhamanassa neva charika pannayittha na masiti.
